original_text: And it was covered with cedar above the chambers that were on the forty-five pillars, fifteen in each row.
korean_text: 기둥 위에 있는 들보 사십오 개를 백향목으로 덮었는데 들보는 한 줄에 열 다섯이요

sentences.original_text: And it was covered with cedar
that were on the forty-five pillars
sentences.korean_translation: 그 방들은 마흔다섯 기둥 위에 있었는데
